tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL,
    network_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    metric_date DATE,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE error_logs (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    error_date DATE,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_code INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    metric_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    disk_usage FLOAT
);
